ygData.subject: ERPG - New, highly recommened
ygData.msgSnippet: Attention all RPG ers I just wanted to plug a new Play by E-mail RPG that has started up. I really like It and I think any serious RPG er should check
ygData.messageBody:
Attention all RPG'ers<br><br>I just wanted to
plug a new Play by E-mail RPG that has started up. I
really like It and I think any serious RPG'er should
check it out. Here's the info that the GM sent me,
enjoy;<br><br>Drakkonfira Games in conjunction with Krystol ERPG has begun
yet another gaming experiance. <br><br>This new
venture, which remains untitled as of late has begun
accepting player applications. Please spread the word, but
encourage others to respond before we fill.<br><br>This
project spans all technological eras, a metal and magic
kind of feel. It encompasses nearly 200 character
classes and 100 races, each with unique abilities.
Players will create a character or characters to submerge
in. Firearms, magic, robotics and psionics are a few
of the tools you can use.<br><br>The criteria for
this ERPG are as follows, but can be discussed, all
that is really required is desire;<br>1. Knowledge of
how an ERPG works<br>2. Commitment - 1-2 posts a
week<br>3. Creativity<br>4. Some RPG tabletop or Wargame
experiance.<br><br>To begin, e-mail our head gamemaster, Sachem, with
your name, E-mail and a breif summary of your
experiance level. Also, include the type of character you
would like to play;<br><br>-An assasin with senses as
sharp as his sense of honor.<br>-An engineer who builds
starships for a tyrannical king.<br>-A lone psionic who is
battling his own demons as well as those sent by his
enemies.<br><br>Thank you and happy gaming,<br><br>Sachem@...
